monsters.name: Drow Cultist
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.desc: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The drow cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow cultist to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the drow cultist has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

spells: The drow cultist's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10). The drow cultist can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Lich
monsters.speed: 30 ft., burrow 10 ft., climb 10 ft., fly 10 ft. (hover), swim 10 ft.
monsters.damage_immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsters.damage_vulnerabilities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.senses: blindsight 5 ft., darkvision 5 ft., tremorsense 5 ft., truesight 120 ft., passive Perception 19
monsters.languages: Common plus up to five other languages

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary_actions.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The lich uses its Paralyzing Touch.

legendary_actions.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each living creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 (6d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters: Ugluk Occhionero, Araldo del Volto Violento

monsters.name: Ugluk Occhionero, Araldo del Volto Violento
monsters.damage_immunities: fire, necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, force, poison, psychic; Bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing (if raging)
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., truesight 120 ft., passive Perception 22

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
traits.desc: If Ugluk fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Ordinary Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The Ugluk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, expect the magic of the Tides.

traits.name: Pink Crystal Vulnerability
traits.desc: Weapons made of pink crystal or a fragment of the Red star inflicts +1d10 damage of the type of the weapon.

traits.name: Tides Sense
traits.desc: Ugluk has expertise on Insight and Perception, and he has advantage on any ability check to perceive or know anything about a creature or a fact in the Tides. Its True sight only works on creatures and things that are in the Tides.

traits.name: Vortex of the Tides
traits.desc: Every Chaos point spent within 100 feet (10 feet per point of the Visage Power) from Ugluk, counts and has every effect of two spent Chaos points. Every creature that receives the benefit of a Chaos Point within 10 feet per point of the Visage Power, is exposed to the Disgregation plague.

traits.name: Barbarian Fighter
traits.desc:
Ugluk has advantage on Strenght checks and saving throw, and the total result of any Strenght check of his can't go under 24.
It has advantage on Dexterity saving throw against anything that it can see, and it can't be surprised (unless it's incapacitated)
It also has resistence to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.

traits.name: Gruumsh's Fury
traits.desc: Ugluk deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in attacks).

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the Ugluk can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Skullsplitter Powers (Exalted)
Plague: Disgregation
traits.desc:
Once per turn on a successful melee attack, it deals an extra 4 necrotic damage. The target makes a Dexterity saving throw CD 18. If it fails, an object or effect that gives an AC or an AC bonus is reduced by2. If it reaches 0, it is destroyed, dispelled (if it's a magical effect) or otherwise neutralized. Every point that doesn't reduce its AC, deals to the target 4 (1d8) force damage and a -1 penalty to Constitution ability checks and saving throws.
At the beginning of the turn of the target, if it has 0 hps and has this penalty inflicted, it gains one Link with the Visage of violence. This can't happen again in this way before 24 hours have passed.
If this penalty reaches the target's Constitution score, it make a Tides saving throw. If it fails, it disintegrates and reforms as Converted.
Against objects that don't provide AC, the Disgregation directly inflicts damage.

traits.name: True Herald Form: Pit of Reciprocal Destruction
traits.desc: When the Herald reaches 0 hit points, its mortal form crumbles and the real Herald takes shape, becoming True Herald Ugluk, that embodies the will of every being of the universe to obtain ultimate, reciprocal destruction.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Ugluk can activate the Annihilation Aura if possible, then can make three weapon attacks.

actions.name: Annihilation Aura
actions.desc:
This aura has a radius of 25 feet (5 feet per half of the Visage's power); creatures that have maximum Chaos points, or a Conversion of the Chaos Triad, are immune to the effects of the aura.
Everything that creates, summons, heals or repairs fails, unless the creature generating the effect succeeds on a Tides saving throw.
Everything that heals hit points or gives temporary hit points is negated based on the Visage's power (see table; use the spell level if possible, or the creature CR otherwise).
After its activation, the Herald can suppress or resume the aura at whim, with no action.

actions.name: Skullsplitter, Exalted (+3 Greataxe)
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (1d12 + 10) plus 4 (1d8) slashing damage.  Once per turn, it deals an extra 4 necrotic damage and the target makes a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw against the Disgregation Plague.
1 charge and bonus action: plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage until the beginning of your next turn.
1 charge and bonus action: target makes a DC +21 Wisdom saving throw. If it fails, it's frightened until the end of your next turn. If it fails by 5 or more, it's also deafened, until the condition is removed.
Critical hit: its damage counts as a reduction of the hit points, until the next long rest of the target.
Critical hit, 2 charges and no recharge: it grinds the living target, attacking it once per round for 5 rounds or until it falls. Action and Strenght check to remove it forcibly. Ugluk can pick it up normally.

actions.name: Annihilation Ray
actions.desc: If the aura has been active since the beginning of Ugluk's last turn, the Herald can turn it into a 50-foot line (double the range of the aura). Everything in the line must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. If it fails, the target gets 43 (1d6 + 40) force damage, and the target and everything it wears or holds becomes under the effect of an antimagic field. The target can make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw at the end of its turn to terminate this effect. The aura turns off until the end of Ugluk's next turn.

reactions.name: Disgregating Counterattack
reactions.desc: When Ugluk is being attacked in melee, the attacking weapon (or creature, if there is no weapon) is exposed to the Disgregation plague.

legendary_actions.name: Absorb Pawn (1 action)
legendary_actions.desc: Ugluk touches a Pawn of the Visage of violence, disintegrates it and Ugluk recharges its Aura of Annihilation.

legendary_actions.name: Devourer Hunger (1 action)
legendary_actions.desc: Ugluk uses the fame del divoratore cantrip from the Skullsplitter (30 feet line 5 feet wide, DC +21 Strenght saving throw or 4 (1d8) necrotic damage, or 5 (1d10) if bloodied. On a fail, a Large or smaller target and every object of that size are pulled 10 feet towards Ugluk).

legendary_actions.name: Battle Cry (2 actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Every creature of Ugluk's choice in a range of 60 feet gains advantage to its next attack roll until the end of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Plague burst (2 action)
legendary_actions.desc: Every creature in the Aura receives the Disgregation plague.

monsters.name: Ancient Black Dragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 26

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack:+ 15 to hit reach 15 ft. one target. Hit 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit reach 10 ft. one target. Hit 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit reach 20 ft . one target. Hit 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

reactions.name: Amphibious
reactions.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water

reactions.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
reactions.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 ft. of the dragon must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

spells: The archmage is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The archmage can cast disguise self and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step

spells.5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, scrying, wall of force

spells: * The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.
